channel.title: Php Sites on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Php Sites on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: scissor sisters
item.description: Last night I hung out with tommie and we went to see the scissor sisters. He is good friends with them so we got to meet them and such. it was pretty dope. they are incredibly nice guys. however the pinnicle of the experience was the show. o m g. they are really good live. I really didn’t expect it to be soo good. very different than I ever imagined. anyway.
